comment: As a man , I recognised I was a constant threat to women . Now that I self ID as a woman , I am no threat at all . In fact the roles have reversed and it is bigoted TERFs who are the danger to me . What if I end my life due to transphobic lesbians rejecting me ? My struggle is real .
